name: content-creation-pipeline
description: Extract information from source material, analyze it, write content, and review for quality

stages.name: extract
stages.prompt: Read the input carefully and extract all key facts, data points, and important information. Create a comprehensive structured list.
stages.output_format: Bullet list of extracted facts with source attribution if available

stages.name: analyze
stages.prompt: Analyze the extracted information. Identify patterns, trends, key insights, and implications. Provide structured analysis with conclusions.
stages.output_format: Structured analysis with: Key Patterns, Insights, and Implications sections

stages.name: write
stages.prompt: Using the analysis as foundation, create well-structured content. Write engaging, clear text appropriate for the topic. Include an introduction, main body sections, and conclusion.
stages.output_format: Structured document with headings, paragraphs, and key points from analysis integrated

stages.name: review
stages.prompt: Review the written content critically. Assess: clarity, accuracy, completeness, engagement, and structure. Provide specific improvement recommendations.
stages.output_format: Review report with: Strengths, Areas for Improvement, Specific Suggestions, PASS/FAIL rating

stages.name: finalize
stages.prompt: Polish and format the content for final publication. Apply professional formatting, ensure consistent style, and create a clean final version.
stages.output_format: Final formatted document ready for publication
